12#if 0

20#include <sys/types.h>
21#include <sys/queue.h>
22
23#include <bitstring.h>
24#include <ctype.h>
25#include <errno.h>
26#include <stdio.h>
27#include <stdlib.h>
28#include <string.h>
29#include <unistd.h>
30
31#include "../common/common.h"
32
33static int vi_nothread_run __P((WIN *wp, void *(*fun)(void*), void *data));
34static int vi_nothread_lock __P((WIN *, void **));
35
36/*
37 * thread_init
38 *
39 * PUBLIC: void thread_init __P((GS *gp));
40 */
41void
42thread_init(GS *gp)
43{
44 gp->run = vi_nothread_run;
45 gp->lock_init = vi_nothread_lock;
46 gp->lock_end = vi_nothread_lock;
47 gp->lock_try = vi_nothread_lock;
48 gp->lock_unlock = vi_nothread_lock;
49}
50
51static int
52vi_nothread_run(WIN *wp, void *(*fun)(void*), void *data)
53{
54 fun(data);
55 return 0;
56}
57
58static int
59vi_nothread_lock (WIN * wp, void **lp)
60{
61 return 0;
62}
63
